statements: UPDATE Gene_Editing_Techniques SET technique_description='CRISPR-Cas9 is a genome editing technology that allows researchers to modify parts of a genome by removing, adding, or altering sections of the DNA sequence.' WHERE id=1
UPDATE Gene_Editing_Techniques SET researcher_name='Dr. Jane Doe', success_rate=0.85, technique_name='TALEN' WHERE id=2
UPDATE Gene_Editing_Techniques SET technique_description = 'CRISPR-Cas9 is a powerful gene editing tool' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Gene_Editing_Techniques SET researcher_name = 'Dr. Jane Doe', success_rate = 0.85 WHERE technique_name = 'Zinc Finger Nuclease';
UPDATE GeneEditingTechniques SET technique_name='CRISPR-Cas9', target_gene='GeneA' WHERE technique_id=1;
UPDATE GeneEditingOutcomes SET edited_gene='EditedGeneB', success=true WHERE technique_id=2;
UPDATE GeneEditingTechniques SET target_gene = 'GeneA', modification_type = 'Insertion' WHERE technique_id = 1;
UPDATE GeneEditingOutcomes SET edited_gene = 'GeneB', success = TRUE WHERE outcome_id = 3;
UPDATE GeneEditingTechniques SET description = 'A genetic engineering technique that involves editing DNA at specific sites' WHERE technique_id = 1;
UPDATE ExperimentalData SET outcome = 'Successful' WHERE experiment_id = 5;
UPDATE GeneEditingTechniques SET description = 'CRISPR/Cas9 is a widely used gene editing technique' WHERE technique_name = 'CRISPR/Cas9';
UPDATE ExperimentalData SET researcher_name = 'Dr. Jane Smith', outcome = 'Successful' WHERE researcher_name = 'Dr. John Doe';
UPDATE researchers SET affiliation='University A' WHERE researcher_id=1;
UPDATE outcomes SET success=true, result='Positive' WHERE outcome_id=3;
UPDATE gene_editing_techniques SET description = 'CRISPR-Cas9 is a versatile gene-editing technique' WHERE technique_id = 1;
UPDATE researchers SET affiliation = 'University of California, Berkeley' WHERE researcher_id = 2;
UPDATE GeneEditingTechniques SET description = 'New description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE TargetGenes SET end_position = 500 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE GeneEditingTechniques SET description = 'CRISPR-Cas9 is a genome editing technique that allows for precise modification of DNA' WHERE name = 'CRISPR-Cas9';
UPDATE EditingEffects SET editing_method = 'ZFN' WHERE id = 3;
